name: Upgrade In-Progress
description:
You are inside a bunker and your only contact with the outside world is a Drone you just found you can connect to.

This is a game where you will interact with the world by using a real programming language.

You will start learning the skills needed to be able to explore the world and be able to interact with different devices once you get to the upgrades/powerups

NOTE: If you turn right or left and you find yourself unable to move, repeat the same command to be able to continue (e.g. if moveRight() then moveRight() again)
